topic.title: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10196)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10198)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act
This act SHALL conform to Consol Allergy Problem Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10208)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity (CONF:10209)
This playingEntity Contains exactly one [1..1] code
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.06

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10199)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer (CONF:10211)
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10212)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69747-4" EMS Existence of environmental allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10214)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10215)
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component (CONF:10213)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69748-2" Known allergies to food or environmental agents (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10216)
Required if Existence is True
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EnvironmentalAllergyType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.83 STATIC (CONF:10217)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.07

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67794-8" Existence of drug allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10203)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10204)
If NEMSIS EHistory.06 is "No Known Drug Allergies," the value should be FALSE. If it is a proper value, the value should be TRUE. If it is a flavor of null, the appropriate flavor should be used here. See the null table to translate NEMSIS flavors into HL7; original values may be stored in Observation.text.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10196)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10198)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act
This act SHALL conform to Consol Allergy Problem Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10208)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity (CONF:10209)
This playingEntity Contains exactly one [1..1] code
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.06

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10199)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer (CONF:10211)
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10212)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69747-4" EMS Existence of environmental allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10214)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10215)
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component (CONF:10213)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69748-2" Known allergies to food or environmental agents (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10216)
Required if Existence is True
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EnvironmentalAllergyType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.83 STATIC (CONF:10217)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.07

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67794-8" Existence of drug allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10203)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10204)
If NEMSIS EHistory.06 is "No Known Drug Allergies," the value should be FALSE. If it is a proper value, the value should be TRUE. If it is a flavor of null, the appropriate flavor should be used here. See the null table to translate NEMSIS flavors into HL7; original values may be stored in Observation.text.

p.ph: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section
